code: @Test public void testCamelGroovy() throws Exception {     // install the camel blueprint xml file we use in this test     URL url = ObjectHelper.loadResourceAsURL("org/apache/camel/itest/CamelGroovyTest.xml", CamelGroovyTest.class.getClassLoader()).     installBlueprintAsBundle("CamelGroovyTest", url, true).     // lookup Camel from OSGi     CamelContext camel = getOsgiService(bundleContext, CamelContext.class).     // test camel     MockEndpoint mock = camel.getEndpoint("mock:result", MockEndpoint.class).     mock.expectedBodiesReceived(6).     camel.createProducerTemplate().sendBody("direct:start", 3).     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). }
